creator: teemu.talja@objectinformatics.fi
text:
bea weblogic server v6.1 announces an exception:
weblogic.xml.dom.ChildCountException

there are two <url-pattern> tags specified for 
the one and only servlet in the Fop.war web 
application, when you remove one of them the 
program starts working.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Still a problem in 0.20.3. The servlet spec allows only exactly one pattern per 
mapping.

creator: oleg@tkachenko.com
text: This web.xml is obsolete. New (and valid) one is now at contrib/servlet/conf.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
